statements: SELECT * FROM ProductQualityMonitoring;
SELECT product_id, inspection_date FROM ProductQualityMonitoring ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT inspection_id, inspection_result FROM ProductQualityMonitoring WHERE inspection_result = 'Pass';
SELECT * FROM ProductQualityMonitoring WHERE inspection_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT inspection_id, product_id, inspection_date, inspection_result FROM ProductQualityMonitoring ORDER BY product_id, inspection_date;
SELECT * FROM ProductQualityMonitoring ORDER BY inspection_date DESC, product_id ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_id, inspection_result FROM ProductQualityMonitoring WHERE inspection_result = 'Passed'
SELECT inspection_id, product_id, inspection_date FROM ProductQualityMonitoring WHERE inspection_result = 'Failed'
SELECT * FROM ProductQualityMonitoring ORDER BY inspection_result DESC, inspection_date ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ProductQualityMonitoring WHERE inspection_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM Inspections;
SELECT id, inspection_date, inspector_name FROM Inspections WHERE inspection_passed = true;
SELECT product_id, COUNT(*) FROM Inspections GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT inspector_name, COUNT(*) FROM Inspections GROUP BY inspector_name ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT id, test_date, test_passed FROM TestResults WHERE test_passed = false;
SELECT id, inspection_date, inspector_name FROM Inspections WHERE inspection_passed = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM Inspections JOIN TestResults ON Inspections.id = TestResults.inspection_id;
SELECT inspector_name, COUNT(*) AS inspection_count FROM Inspections GROUP BY inspector_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT product_id, test_date, test_passed, test_notes FROM TestResults WHERE test_passed = FALSE ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT inspector_name FROM Inspections WHERE DATE_PART('year', inspection_date) = 2022;
SELECT * FROM ProductInspections ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, inspector_name FROM ProductInspections WHERE inspector_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT result, remarks FROM InspectionResults WHERE inspection_id = 1;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM InspectionMetrics WHERE metric_value > 0.8;
SELECT inspection_id, product_name, inspection_date FROM ProductInspections WHERE inspection_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-09-30';
SELECT * FROM ProductInspections WHERE inspection_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, inspection_date FROM ProductInspections WHERE inspector_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT product_name, inspection_date, result FROM ProductInspections WHERE result = 'Pass';
SELECT p.product_name, m.metric_name, m.metric_value FROM ProductInspections p JOIN InspectionMetrics m ON p.inspection_id = m.inspection_id;
SELECT p.product_name, r.result, r.remarks FROM ProductInspections p JOIN InspectionResults r ON p.inspection_id = r.inspection_id;
SELECT * FROM inspections WHERE inspection_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT id, inspector_name, inspection_date FROM inspections WHERE inspector_name = 'John Doe' AND inspection_result = 'Pass';
SELECT product_name, manufacturer FROM products WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Company';
SELECT id, inspector_name, department FROM inspectors ORDER BY inspector_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM test_results WHERE test_result = 'Fail' ORDER BY test_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM inspections WHERE inspection_result = 'Pass' ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer FROM products WHERE manufacturer = 'Apple' ORDER BY product_name;
SELECT inspector_name, department FROM inspectors WHERE department = 'Quality Control';
SELECT product_id, test_date, test_result FROM test_results WHERE test_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';

SELECT inspections.inspector_name, inspections.inspection_date, test_results.test_date, test_results.test_result FROM inspections JOIN test_results ON inspections.product_id = test_results.product_id WHERE inspections.inspection_result = 'Fail';
SELECT * FROM inspections
SELECT inspector_id, inspector_name, department FROM inspectors
SELECT inspection_date, inspection_result FROM inspections WHERE inspection_result = 'Pass'
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT inspector_id, hire_date FROM inspectors WHERE department = 'Quality Control'
SELECT * FROM inspections
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM products
SELECT inspector_id, inspector_name, hire_date FROM inspectors
SELECT test_name, test_result, test_date FROM test_results
SELECT inspection_id, inspector_id, history_description FROM inspection_history
